code: @Test public void testBeanInPipeline() throws Exception {     Object response = template.requestBody("direct:start", "Start:").     assertEquals("Start:onetwothree", response). }

protected Context createJndiContext() throws Exception {     JndiContext answer = new JndiContext().     answer.bind("one", new MyBean("one")).     answer.bind("two", new MyBean("two")).     answer.bind("three", new MyBean("three")).     return answer. }
public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:start").pipeline("bean:one", "bean:two", "log:x", "log:y", "bean:three"). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").pipeline("bean:one", "bean:two", "log:x", "log:y", "bean:three").         }     }. }
public String doSomething(String body) {     return body + postfix. }
